prompt.description: Text prompt describing the desired image content
prompt.title: Prompt

width.description: Output image width in pixels (will be rounded to multiple of 8)
width.title: Width

height.description: Output image height in pixels (will be rounded to multiple of 8)
height.title: Height

seed.description: Seed for reproducible generation. Use -1 for random seed
seed.title: Seed

steps.description: Number of inference steps for the diffusion process (recommended: 8-10 for turbo)
steps.title: Steps

shift.description: Time shift parameter for the flow matching scheduler (1.0-10.0)
shift.title: Shift
